Package gbssg.Jamalia_Polat_Vrlec

Class Polyeder

java.lang.Object
gbssg.Jamalia_Polat_Vrlec.Polyeder
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGeometrieObject, ISerializer
public class Polyeder extends Object implements IGeometrieObject, ISerializer
This class is a blueprint of a polyhedron. A polyhedron is a three-dimensional body which surfaces are made of polygons.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Filip Vrlec, Serkan Polat, Moiz Jamalia
